target.name: land_parcel
target.filter: is land_parcel and has indicator shape

handler.backward: (PRODUCT..net_mass? and PRODUCT..thousand_grains_mass?) ? ((((POPULATION * PRODUCT..net_mass(gram)) / sum_working_zone_areas(land_parcel, :square_meter)) * 1000) / PRODUCT..thousand_grains_mass(gram)) : ((POPULATION * PRODUCT..grains_count(unity)) / sum_working_zone_areas(land_parcel, :square_meter))
handler.forward: (PRODUCT..net_mass? and PRODUCT..thousand_grains_mass?) ? ((((VALUE * PRODUCT..thousand_grains_mass(gram)) / 1000) * sum_working_zone_areas(land_parcel, :square_meter)) / PRODUCT..net_mass(gram)) : ((VALUE / PRODUCT..grains_count(unity)) * sum_working_zone_areas(land_parcel, :square_meter))

handler.name: grains_area_density_in_thousand_per_hectare
handler.backward: (PRODUCT..net_mass? and PRODUCT..thousand_grains_mass?) ? ((POPULATION * PRODUCT..net_mass(gram)) / (sum_working_zone_areas(land_parcel, :hectare) * PRODUCT..thousand_grains_mass(gram))) : ((POPULATION * PRODUCT..grains_count(thousand)) / sum_working_zone_areas(land_parcel, :hectare))
handler.forward: (PRODUCT..net_mass? and PRODUCT..thousand_grains_mass?) ? ((VALUE * PRODUCT..thousand_grains_mass(gram) * sum_working_zone_areas(land_parcel, :hectare)) / PRODUCT..net_mass(gram)) : ((VALUE / PRODUCT..grains_count(thousand)) * sum_working_zone_areas(land_parcel, :hectare))
